about_the_game:
Discover the fascinating Aeternum Grand Plaza hotel, where you must pay attention to your surroundings and choose the right path to find the exit.

Aeternum Grand Plaza is an anomaly-seeking game set in a hotel with different scenarios and inspired by "The Exit 8". In this game, the player must progress through the various floors of the hotel, trying to reach the exit while observing the details of the hallways they walk through, looking for strange elements that might indicate it’s not the correct hallway.
The procedure is simple: if the hallway contains no anomalies, the player must continue forward to advance through the floors. But if the hallway contains strange elements, you must turn back and keep ascending floors to try to reach the exit.

PLAYTIME

40-100 minutes

name: Aeternum Grand Plaza

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Discover the fascinating Aeternum Grand Plaza hotel, where you must pay attention to your surroundings and choose the right path to find the exit.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
